title: Report reveals Sheffield Hallam as £424m prize asset (Sheffield Hallam University)
text: ( Source : Sheffield Hallam University ) An independent ' Oxford Economics' study has revealed Sheffield Hallam University adds an annual £424 million to the Sheffield City Region economy. The significant figure is equivalent to 85 World
